nodes.excerpt: Regular Expressions are really powerful but do you know how to use them and what to use them for? This primer will take you through your first steps to some really advanced looking patterns.

localize.title: JavaScriptのRegExを危険なほど学ぶ方法

localize.title: 你如何在JavaScript中学习足够多的RegEx以达到危险的程度
localize.description: 正则表达式真的很强大，但你知道如何使用它们以及使用它们的目的吗？这篇入门读物将带领你从最初的步骤到一些真正高级的模式。
